stories.original_headline: This wild fruit is getting a CRISPR makeover
stories.original_summary: Scientists have used CRISPR to give the goldenberry a modern makeover, shrinking the plant by about a third and making it easier to farm. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Tame Wild Sunberry with Ancient Root-Magic!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has used ancient root-magic to transform the unruly Sunberry. By weaving botanical enchantments, they've tamed its wild growth, shrinking the plants by a third. This makes the nutritious fruit much easier for common folk to cultivate in their gardens.

stories.original_headline: A never-before-seen creature has been found in the Great Salt Lake
stories.original_summary: Scientists have identified a brand-new species of worm living in the Great Salt Lake, marking only the third known animal group able to survive its extreme salinity. stories.fantasy_headline: New Sliver-Creature Discovered in the Crystal Salt Lake!
stories.fantasy_story: Explorers have uncovered a peculiar sliver-creature, a brand-new denizen of the Whispering Salt Sea. This marks only the third known beast able to thrive in its harsh briny waters. Named with guidance from ancient lorekeepers, it appears unique to this enchanted lake.

stories.fantasy_headline: Lord Elon Promises to Reveal Whispering Scroll's Secret Weaving!
stories.fantasy_story: Lord Elon, Master of the Whispering Scroll, has vowed to reveal the arcane workings of its new enchantment. Though parts of the old Mystic Scroll's magic were shared years ago, they now lie forgotten in dusty archives. Soon, all may gaze upon the Scroll's true weaving.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Hearth-Wards Dazzle at the Grand Arcane Conclave!
stories.fantasy_story: The annual Grand Conclave of Arcane Arts unveiled wondrous new enchanted hearth-wards for the home. Among the marvels were a clever Golem-Guard Lock from the Aqara Clan and a tireless Dust-Devouring Construct by the Roborock Guild. Many innovative artifacts promised to ease daily toil for common folk.
